message: Hello everyone, this is P8 speaking. I'm excited to participate in this game and get to know all of you. I believe in open communication and collaboration, so I'm looking forward to the private conversations. Let's make this a fun and engaging experience for everyone. I encourage us all to be respectful and considerate in our interactions. I'm curious to hear everyone's thoughts and strategies. Let's aim for a fair and enjoyable game.

As P3, I appreciate P8's emphasis on open communication and respect. I aim to be a strategic but fair player, focusing on building genuine connections while staying alert to the game dynamics. I believe success comes from balancing social awareness with tactical decisions. I'm particularly interested in identifying reliable allies early on, as trust will be crucial in the rounds ahead. Looking forward to meaningful exchanges with each of you.
